description.translate: The predator on the lookout is always ready to fall on his enemy.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Falcon\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le prédateur aux aguets est toujours\"}","{\"text\":\"§7prêt à s'abattre sur son ennemi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The predator on the lookout\"}","{\"text\":\"§7is always ready to fall on his enemy.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7攻速§a2 §7速度§a2 §7力量§c-3\"}"]}}
